static string GetTaggedText (  const string &  sText,
const string &  sStartTag,
const string &  sEndTag,
const string &  sDefault
)  [static]
 

Get text between specified tags, and a selected default text on failure.

Parameters:
sText The text that should be searched.
sTag The start tag will is <stag> and the end tag is </stag>.
Returns:
A string containing the text between the first occurrence of the two tags. Returns a the chosen default text on failure.
